alias.description: This will cause the message’s name to appear as the given alias, but your username will still display
alias.title: Alias

avatar.description: If provided, this will make the avatar use the provided image URL
avatar.title: Avatar

emoji.description: This will cause the message’s name to appear as the given alias, but your username will still display
emoji.title: Emoji

channel.description: The channel name with the prefix in front of it
channel.title: Channel

text.description: The text of the message to send, is optional because of attachments
text.title: Text

ts.description: Displays the time next to the text portion
ts.title: Timestamp

videoUrl.description: Video file to play, only supports what html video does
videoUrl.title: Video URL

thumbUrl.description: An image that displays to the left of the text, looks better when this is relatively small
thumbUrl.title: Thumb URL

messageLink.description: Only applicable if the timestamp is provided, as it makes the time clickable to this link
messageLink.title: Message Link

imageUrl.description: The image to display, will be “big” and easy to see
imageUrl.title: Image URL

title.description: Title to display for this attachment, displays under the author
title.title: Title

titleLinkDownload.description: When this is true, a download icon appears and clicking this saves the link to file
titleLinkDownload.title: Title Link Download

titleLink.description: Providing this makes the title clickable, pointing to this link
titleLink.title: Title Link

authorLink.description: Providing this makes the author name clickable and points to this link
authorLink.title: Author Link

authorIcon.description: Displays a tiny icon to the left of the Author’s name
authorIcon.title: Author Icon

value.description: The value of this field, displayed underneath the title value
value.title: Value

short.description: Whether this field should be a short field
short.title: Short

text.description: The text to display for this attachment, it is different than the message’s text
text.title: Text

collapsed.description: Causes the image, audio, and video sections to be hiding when collapsed is true
collapsed.title: Collapsed

color.description: The color you want the order on the left side to be, any value background-css supports
color.title: Color

audioUrl.description: Audio file to play, only supports what html audio does
audioUrl.title: Audio URL
